query:
SELECT DISTINCT rawAreaText, hospitalId, h.name as hospitalName 
FROM purchases p 
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id 
WHERE rawAreaText IS NOT NULL AND rawAreaText != '' AND areaId IS NULL 
ORDER BY h.name, rawAreaText 
LIMIT 50
